attributes.action: Enforce a parking cap on private hospital parking or abolish it all together!
attributes.additional_details: Ive just visited Royal Bolton Hospital and noticed signed saying change to parking i couldnt believe what i have seen when i checked ... over 100% increase on hospital parking for visitors and patients this is disgusting and out right outrageous !!!!! ( it used to be £3 for 24 hrs only a few days ago when i last visited)
attributes.background: These private companies shouldnt be able to heist prices from £3 per day to £8 a day over a weekend just like that... thats over 100% increase and extortionate!!!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909
